# Dig automation
Automates digging in the mine

# Use
Requires the "Mine" to be open.
The "d" key will activate the main script. It will automatically activate the counter-dig script as necessary and run through to dig all squares in the mine. The scripts will start at the first tab in the mine and dig from the top right and the bottom left towards the middle.
There will be a slight delay before the scripts start to dig, as the script will attempt to dig all squares before generating new layers, this is to prevent conflicts with any workers or the player if they also happen to be digging.

# Requirements
The code is 2 scripts with a maximum 18 lines. The scripts can be viewed in the individual files as code with comments.
